projects.Title: Mazaar - ecommerce Website
projects.Description: Mazaar is a full-stack MERN e-commerce platform designed for modern shoppers to browse and purchase products seamlessly. The app offers real-time product listing with advanced filtering options based on categories, price, and ratings. Users can manage their shopping cart, view responsive product pages at a glance, and track purchases with an integrated sustainability score.
Features: Real-time product listings with category, price, and rating filters
Responsive product pages optimized for mobile and desktop
Sustainability tracker providing eco-scores for purchased items
Dynamic UI with optimized performance across devices
Hosted deployment ensuring accessibility anytime, anywhere

projects.Title: Dynamic Movie Search App
projects.Description: Dynamic Movie Search App is a web application that allows users to search for movies in real-time. Built with modern web technologies, it offers a seamless user experience with features like instant search results, movie details, and dynamic trending movie lists.
Features: Search functionality for over a million movies across multiple languages
Real-time data fetching using the TMDB API with debounced search
Dynamic home page displaying top 20 trending movies
Live trending section based on user searches stored via Appwrite
Optimized API calls to prevent crashes and excessive billing
Clean and responsive UI for mobile and desktop compatibility
Lightweight architecture with Appwrite replacing a full backend

projects.Title: ScreenTime Tracker
projects.Description: ScreenTime Tracker is a web application designed to help users monitor and manage their screen time across various devices. The app provides insights into daily usage patterns, allows users to set limits on app usage, and offers personalized recommendations for reducing screen time. With a user-friendly interface and robust analytics, ScreenTime Tracker empowers users to take control of their digital habits.
Features: Real-time screen time tracking via Chrome extension across websites
Centralized backend API for storing and managing user activity data
Interactive dashboard visualizing daily usage and app distribution
Productivity vs. distraction insights with clear categorization
Historical data view to analyze past screen habits and trends
Responsive and intuitive design for desktop users

projects.Title: AI-Mock Interview
projects.Description: AI-Mock Interview is an innovative application designed to help users prepare for job interviews using AI-driven simulations. The app offers a realistic interview experience with customizable questions, real-time feedback, and performance analytics. Users can practice common interview scenarios, receive tips for improvement, and track their progress over time. With a user-friendly interface and advanced AI capabilities, AI-Mock Interview empowers job seekers to build confidence and enhance their interview skills.
Features: Customizable interview simulations with a wide range of questions
Real-time feedback on user responses and performance
Performance analytics to track progress and identify improvement areas
Rate and review community recipes
Save and manage favorite recipes
Detailed recipe pages with ingredients, step-by-step instructions, and nutrition information
Dark mode support for better user experience

projects.Title: Nike Clone
projects.Description: Nike Clone is a fully functional e-commerce application that replicates the core features of the Nike online store. Users can browse products, add them to their cart, and complete purchases using a secure checkout process. The app also includes user authentication, product reviews, and an admin dashboard for managing inventory and orders.
Features: Real-time speech-to-text transcription
Automatic extraction of meeting details including date, time, and participants
Identification and tracking of action items with assignees and deadlines
Generation of structured meeting summaries including key points, decisions, and next steps
Easy sharing of meeting summaries via email
Voice-controlled commands for hands-free interaction
Integration with various APIs for enhanced processing
